programme.title: Zaļgalvis
programme.desc: Tiek pieņemts, ka vismaz puse no mūsu miskastēs atrodamā satura ir tāds, kas var noārdīties bioloģiskā veidā. Kompostu konsultante Zane Gailīte stāsta par daudzveidīgajiem kompostēšanas paņēmieniem un to, kā šis produkts ir labvēlīgs gan dabai, gan saimniecībai, gan maciņam.

programme.title: Tutas Lietas
programme.desc: Cik rokai ir pirkstu? Kā pagatavot kūku no smiltīm? Un kā skan bungas? Izzinot sevi un pasauli, bērniem ir daudz jautājumu. "Tutas lietas" ir video stāstu sērija bērniem vecumā no viena līdz pieciem gadiem, ko žurnāliste un raidījumu vadītāja Marta Selecka radījusi kopā ar domubiedriem – mazu bērnu vecākiem no kino un TV profesionāļu vides. Raidījuma būtība – tas ir mīļš un izglītojošs ekrāna saturs pašiem mazākajiem, viņiem saprotamā valodā par interesantām un noderīgām tēmām. Raidījuma galvenā varone ir jaukā meitene, bērnu draudzene Tuta. Viņas lomā iejutusies aktrise un mamma Liene Sebre. Tuta mazajiem jautru rotaļu veidā māca pašus pirmos vārdus, krāsas, dziesmiņas un skaitļus. Kopā ar Tutu jaunas lietas bērniem apgūt palīdz arī draudzīgā un ziņkārīgā Lapsa. "Tutas lietu" stāstiņu kopējo konceptu veidojusi Marta Selecka, bet scenārijus sagatavojusi jaunā, talantīgā bērnu autore Inga Mastiņa. Bērniem saistošu radošu vizuālo noskaņu radījusi pieredzējusī dizainere Ilze Žūriņa-Šeibaka, bet Tutas dziesmas mūzikas autore un izpildītāja ir dziedātāja un komponiste Laura Polence. Tutas piedzīvojumus iemūžinājis operators Dāvis Doršs, bet projekta režiju un montāžu veidojusi Andra Doršs, kura par savu darbu Latvijas kino projektos ieguvusi arī Nacionālo kino balvu "Lielais Kristaps".

programme.title: Ralfs gatavo
programme.desc: Bērnu fantāzijai nav robežu! Un virtuvē, kurā saimnieko brālīši Ralfs un Martins, gatavošana ātri vien kļūst par izklaidi. Bagete šeit vienā mirklī pārvēršas zobenā, pūdercukurs kļūst par sniegu, no sviesta tiek būvētas piramīdas, bet no mīklas top vesels zoodārzs. Un, lai katrā sērijā uzzinātu arī kaut ko jaunu un vērtīgu par dažādiem pārtikas produktiem, puikas brauc ciemos – meklēt lielāko ķirbi, kārtīgi pasvīst zemeņu vagās, skaitīt graudiņus kukurūzas vālītēs un apciemot kaziņas. Meties šajā piedzīvojumā kopā ar mazajiem pavāriem un skaties jaunās "Ralfs gatavo" sērijas sestdienās 9:30 no rīta LTV1 un LSM bērnistabā!

programme.title: Dzīve busiņā
programme.desc: Šis filmu cikls ir stāsts par to, kā visu dzīvi ietilpināt vienā mikroautobusā. Dokumentālais seriāls seko žurnālistes un rakstnieces Aino Huilajas ikdienai un ceļojumiem busiņā. Kopā ar viņu ceļo viņas dzīvesbiedrs Jerri Ilkenens un suns Arska. Uz Eiropas ceļiem viņi sastaps un iztaujās arī citus busiņos dzīvojošos. Filmu cikls ļauj tuvāk iepazīt dzīvesveidu, kas kļuvis par sociālo tīklu tendenci. Tas ir aizraujošs, jautrs un daudzpusīgs ceļojošā dzīvesveida atainojums, kam netrūkst pašironijas. Ceļotāji prāto par to, kas nepieciešams labai dzīvei, kas ir tas, kas cilvēkus saista minimālismā, vai šāda ceļošana sniedz laimi un brīvību, kā arī par to, kā, ceļā esot, strādāt un nopelnīt. Filmas materiāls ir radīts ceļā un lielākoties tas ir arī apstrādāts un producēts mikroautobusā. Pirmajā sezonā ceļš vedīs lielākoties uz Eiropas dienvidiem - gan uz Spānijas dienvidiem, gan Sardīniju un Dolomītiem Itālijā -, kā arī uz Lapzemi un Ziemeļu ledus piekrasti.

Filmu cikls ļauj tuvāk iepazīt dzīvesveidu, kas kļuvis par sociālo tīklu tendenci. Tas ir aizraujošs, jautrs un daudzpusīgs ceļojošā dzīvesveida atainojums, kam netrūkst pašironijas. Ceļotāji prāto par to, kas nepieciešams labai dzīvei, kas ir tas, kas cilvēkus saista minimālismā, vai šāda ceļošana sniedz laimi un brīvību, kā arī par to, kā, ceļā esot, strādāt un nopelnīt. Filmas materiāls ir radīts ceļā un lielākoties tas ir arī apstrādāts un producēts mikroautobusā. Pirmajā sezonā ceļš vedīs lielākoties uz Eiropas dienvidiem - gan uz Spānijas dienvidiem, gan Sardīniju un Dolomītiem Itālijā -, kā arī uz Lapzemi un Ziemeļu ledus piekrasti.

programme.title: Laimes aģents
programme.desc: Kā izmērīt laimi? Butānā ieviests "iekšzemes kopējās laimes" indekss, un Ambers ir viens no aģentiem, kas dodas no mājas uz māju, lai uzrunātu Butānas iedzīvotājus un noskaidrotu, cik laimīgi viņi īsti ir. Viņš pats, lai gan jau četrdesmitgadnieks, joprojām dzīvo kopā ar māti, ir nelabojams romantiķis un sapņo par īstu mīlestību: laimes aģents pats savas laimes meklējumos. Mēs dodamies Amberam līdzi ceļojumā pa Butānu, satiekot dažāda dzīves gājuma ļaudis un ļaujot sev atgādināt par dzīves trauslo skaistumu un ilgām pēc laimes. Lai kur pasaulē mēs arī atrastos… Līdz 20. gadsimta vidum Butāna bijusi noslēgta no pārējās pasaules un tādēļ nereti uztverta kā nepieejama, eksotiska budistu karaļvalsts. Kopš 90. gadiem Butāna pasaulē atpazīstama ar holistisko valsts attīstības filozofiju, kas paredz iedzīvotāju labbūtību un laimi skatīt līdzsvarā ar ekonomiskiem faktoriem.

programme.title: 16+ gada apskats
programme.desc: Latvijas Televīzijas jauniešu platforma "16+" ir gatava ar lielu sāncensību un humoru atskatīties uz 2025. gada spilgtākajiem brīžiem! Šis šovs pārvērš gada apskatu par dinamisku, azartisku un neparedzamu spēli, kur divas komandas sacenšas, lai sezonas noslēgumā teiktu godīgu un pelnītu "paldies" aizvadītajam gadam. Spēles centrā ir liela tabula ar četriem tematiskiem blokiem. Katrā blokā komandas izvēlas kategoriju no 10 līdz 40 punktiem, aiz kuras slēpjas jautājums par 2025. gada notikumiem. Atbilde ir jāsniedz ātri un pārliecinoši, jo katrs punkts var izšķirt uzvaru. Un šo visu kontrolē spēles vadītājs "Valters vecais" jeb reperis "Ods". Un, protams, īstais haoss sākas tad, kad komanda aktivizē īpašo spēles ratu – tas var būt gan glābējs, gan posts. Rats var piešķirt papildpunktus, atņemt tos, izcelt īpašo jautājumu vai atvērt sadaļu "Saderam!", kur komandas sacenšas zināšanu ātrumā, nosaucot pēc iespējas vairāk pareizo atbilžu. Par uzvaru cīnās divas spilgtas un krāsainas komandas: "Zvaigžņu lietus" – satura veidotāji Alishuks M un Jaxoed, kā arī mūziķe Vultūra. "Krāsainie" – satura veidotāja Lāsma Novika, arbūzu nozares līderis Emīls Gaišprātis un mūziķis Henrijs Mucenieks. "16+" spēlē, 16 jautājumi un 16 rata iedaļas!

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Brāļi Hanss un Pauls Tomeki ir identiskie dvīņi. Kamēr Hanss izveidojis spožu biržas māklera karjeru Volstrītā, Pauls sēdējis cietumā par jaunībā izraisītu smagu auto avāriju. Hanss pārdod savu Vīnes dzīvokli, un Pauls nolemj pārņemt brāļa identitāti, lai saņemtu 20 miljonus no šī darījuma un beidzot sāktu cienīgu dzīvi. Pauls nogalina Hansu un sadedzina viņa līķi. Izmeklētajiem nav viegli noskaidrot mirušā personību, viņi izveido upura fotorobotu un lūdz sabiedrības palīdzību. Atsaucas cilvēki, kuri pazinuši Paulu Tomeku.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Jaunais automehāniķis Martins Fričs aizraujas ar dārgo kartingu sportu, tāpēc ir iekūlies parādos pie privātā kreditora Baumaņa, kurš parādus piedzen ar apšaubāmām metodēm. Kad parādu piedzinējs draud viņa draudzenei, Martins sola nogalināt kreditoru Baumani. Nākamajā rītā Baumanis tiešām tiek atrasts miris, bet Martins ir vienīgais aizdomās turamais, kuram nav alibi. Izmeklējot Baumaņa nāvi, Brantnera komanda nāk uz pēdām apjomīgiem nelikumīgiem naudas darījumiem.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Bruno izjautā Simonas māti Melāniju par Giju Puarjē, sieviete ir ar mieru atklāt vairāk detaļu. Izrādās, ka Gijs pie Roberto bijis regulārs viesis. Policija mēģina izprast, ko Gaetāns Birons, kura auto atrasts ceļa malā, varētu būt darījis pusstundu mežā. Viņu aizdomas apstiprinās, kad policija šajā vietā atrod Kamijas Žirāras līķi.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Policija gaida, kad Birons izdarīs kādu kļūdu, lai būtu pamats viņu arestēt. Lorāns norīko Gaetānam un Normandēnam vairs nebilst ne vārda policijai. Stefans pastāsta Džefam par ziņojumiem, kurus viņš iedeva Nadīnei viņas nāves dienā... Katrina skaidrojas ar savu meitu.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Kamēr iecirkņa darbinieki ir aizņemti ar iekšējām problēmām un attiecību līkločiem, ierodas Jaunatnes aizsardzības darbiniece un ziņo par kāda 18 mēnešus veca mazuļa nolaupīšanu. Iecirknis gatavojas Birona notveršanai, un Gijs tiek arestēts par Mandesa slepkavību.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Katrina Gamaša pārmet Ženevjevai, ka viņa nepalīdz savaldīt un vest pie prāta Oseanu. Ženevjeva izjautā Abdelu Asadu un brīnās, kāpēc par bērna nolaupīsanu tiek ziņots nedēļu vēlāk. Natālija un Patriks nopratina Bironu.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Asads tiek arestēts par bērna nolaupīšanu. Birona mājā notiek kratīšana, tiek atrastas fotogrāfijas, kas saistītas ar Nadīni. Asads zvana sievai, bet šķiet, ka saruna jau ir iepriekš izplānota. Taču nu ir zināms, kurā valstī atrodas māte ar nolaupīto bērnu.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Slepkavības ģimenēs
programme.desc: Floridā kādā vakarā policija saņem izsaukumu uz māju smalkā rajonā, kur nostrādājusi signalizācija. Ierodoties notikuma vietā, policisti atklāj līķi - mājas garāžā guļ brutāli nogalināta sieviete. Policistu aizdomas krīt uz mirušās tuvākajiem ģimenes locekļiem - uz vīru Edu, no kura viņa gribējusi šķirties, un uz viņas nu jau pieaugušo dēlu.

programme.title: Midsomeras slepkavības
programme.desc: Detektīvs Toms Bārnabijs ir pacietīgs un metodisks izmeklētājs. Viņš saprot, ka noziegumiem mazā pilsētiņā vienmēr būs sociāls raksturs, tamdēļ svarīgi izprast tās iedzīvotāju attiecības. Tikai un vienīgi viņš spēj pamanīt neskaidrus mājienus un sadzīt pēdas viltīgam slepkavam brīdī, kad nupat, šķiet, tas izbēgs nesodīts. Kad Toms Bārnabijs atgriežas mājās, viņš ir mīlošs vīrs un tēvs, tomēr, neskatoties uz to, detektīvs viņā nekad nesnauž. Citreiz vistrāpīgākās atklāsmes rodas tieši pie brokastu galda! Seriāls "Midsomeras slepkavības" ieturēts vislabākajās britu klasiskā detektīva tradīcijās: virkne aizdomās turamo, sajauktas pēdas, mīklaini mājieni, neizprotami motīvi un iespēja skatītājam pašam minēt, kurš šoreiz būs vainīgais. Seriāls veiksmīgi izrādīts teju visās Eiropas valstīs, kā arī ASV, Kanādā, Dienvidāfrikā un Tuvajos Austrumos, kopumā tas tiek uzņemts jau vairāk nekā 25 gadus.

programme.title: Melnais saraksts
programme.desc: Kritiķu un skatītāju iemīļots kriminālseriāls. Tā darbība sākas dienā, kad darbu FIB galvenajā birojā Vašingtonā uzsāk jauna profilētāja Elizabete Kīna. Tajā pašā rītā tur ierodas viens no FIB meklētākajiem noziedzniekiem, Reimonds "Reds" Redingtons, un labprātīgi ļauj sevi notvert. Reds palīdz FIB sagūstīt citu bīstamu noziedznieku un novērst uzbrukumu civiliedzīvotājiem. Viņš paziņo, ka viņam esot vesels saraksts un informācija par tādiem noziedzniekiem un teroristiem, par kuru esamību FIB pat nenojauš. Reds ir gatavs sadarboties ar vienu savādu noteikumu – viņš runās tikai ar Elizabeti. Tā sākas īpašas attiecības, kuru īstā daba un iemesls ir zināmi tikai Redingtonam. Lai gan pamatā seriāla darbība norit ASV, tas aizved arī uz dažādām eksotiskām vietām visā pasaulē un ļauj ieskatīties kriminālajā pasaulē. Dažādiem apbalvojumiem vairāku gadu laikā izvirzīti seriāla specefektu veidotāji, kaskadieri un muzikālais noformējums.

programme.title: "Baložu Pilni Pagalmi" 30 gadu jubilejas koncerts
programme.desc: Pazīstamās alternatīvās mūzikas grupas "Baložu pilni pagalmi" 30 gadu jubilejas koncerts notika 2024. gada 11. maijā Mežaparka Lielās estrādes Kokaru zālē Grupa "Baložu pilni pagalmi" tika dibināta 1994. gadā. Grupas sastāvs 30 gadu laikā ir vairākkārt mainījies, bet tās nemainīgais un mūžīgais kodols ir mūzikas un tekstu autors Māris Šverns. Pēdējos 14 gadus apvienību veido Māris Šverns (balss, ģitāra), Klāvs Lauls (basģitāra un citi instrumenti) un Uldis Gedra (bungas) Par "Baložiem" mūzikas apskatnieki ir rakstījuši daudzus labus vārdus, kā, piemēram: "Māris Šverns ar "Baložiem" raksta lieliskas dziesmas, kurām daudzi uzliek "underground" un "indie" zīmogu. Taču šim dziesmām ir dvēsele, kas mūsdienu latviešu mūzikā ir retums." Kāds cits citāts: "Latvijas neatkarīgās mūzikas scēnas viens no stūrakmeņiem jau kopš 1994. gada ir muzikālā apvienība "Baložu pilni pagalmi", kuru pilntiesīgi var dēvēt par latviešu "underground" kulta grupu. "Baložu pilni pagalmi" ir fenomens, kas nepārtraukti eksperimentē - pārvarot klišejiskās sajūtas par mūzikas pareizumu, mūziķi rada ļoti atklātas melodijas, kas runā par dzīvi mums apkārt un ļauj pietuvoties tai dīvainajai katarsei, ko var notvert tikai agrā rīta stundā, pēc nakts, kas pavadīta domubiedru vidū.".

programme.title: Gada apskats
programme.desc: Kādi bija šā gada svarīgākie jautājumi, uz kuriem meklējām atbildes? Un uz kādiem jautājumiem atbildes lūkosim gūt nākamajā gadā? LTV Ziņu dienests uz 2025. gada svarīgākajiem notikumiem šoreiz atskatīsies kopā ar tiem cilvēkiem, kuri šogad paši nonākuši ziņu virsrakstos. Raidījuma "Šodienas jautājums" vadītāja Anete Bērtule dosies pie tiem mūsu līdzcilvēkiem, kuri šogad iedvesmoja, rosināja iestāties par savām un citu tiesībām, mainīja iesīkstējušās politiskās paražas un mudināja iztaisnot mugurkaulu, spītējot ģeopolitisko pārmaiņu vējiem. Bet Ziņu dienesta žurnālisti pārcilās aizejošā gada svarīgākās norises Latvijā un pasaulē.

programme.title: Lai top!
programme.desc: Tikpat krāsaini kā XI Latvijas Skolu jaunatnes dziesmu un deju svētki, būs arī raidījumi LAI TOP. Kori, folkloras kopas, tautas un mūsdienu deju kolektīvi, pūtēju un simfoniskie orķestri, džeza grupas — tik dažādi būs priekšnesumi, kurus varēsiet vērot.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Dive into the awe-inspiring world of Dutch engineering, where human ingenuity meets the relentless power of nature. From a remarkable sideways ship launch, to the nations largest flood barrier, each stop reveals a story of engineering innovation. Then, step back in time to uncover the ingenious, water management secrets hidden within the iconic windmills of Kinderdijk.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Under the muck of a Danish bog, a 2,400-year-old body is found so perfectly preserved the stubble on the dead mans chin is visible … as is the rope around his neck. Is this ancient cold case what it seems? At the turn of the 20th century, physician Albert Abrams was inspired to apply the new discovery of radio waves to medicine. He invented a complex-looking machine to diagnose any disease. Thousands flocked to be tested, but the establishment was skeptical. At Berlins Neues Museum, a bust of Egypts Queen Nefertiti portrays a woman so stunning that she has become synonymous with flawless beauty. But when experts use advanced techniques to look beneath the surface, new questions are raised about the queens appearance.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The lost colony of Roanoke is a historic mystery that has not been solved for over 400 years. An intriguing artifact was discovered in 1937: the Dare Stone. Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode one begins on an unremarkable Dutch canal. What we see unfold, however, is anything but. Its one of the most dramatic construction catastrophes in recent history: a double telescopic crane collapse, a barge capsizing and a 187-ton bridge span all careening into a quiet residential neighbourhood resulting in the total destruction of dozens of homes. The reason? A combination of wind, lack of balance and crane operator error. From there, we travel to Asia, where some of the worlds biggest construction sites fail before construction even begins. We witness a variety of construction site collapses: massive holes in the ground that implode in dramatic fashion, hurling retaining walls, roads and equipment dozens of metres below into a pit. Substandard soil conditions and reclaimed land seem to be the biggest reasons for these fails.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode two begins with the horrific fire at Notre Dame Cathedral in the spring of 2019. Multiple eye- witnesses captured the raging flames on their phone cameras, but what they couldnt capture was the frantic, behind-the-scenes confusion and infrastructure fail that contributed to making the fire much more devastating than it should have been. We take viewers behind the scenes. Next, we take a take a look at scaffolding, an integral piece of construction equipment. When it fails, the results can be catastrophic. But why does it fail? We examine the reasons through multiple examples.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Highway Havoc!
programme.desc: Journey through the unforgiving and inhospitable climate of Norways frozen mountains with the elite rescue crews who come to the aid of stranded travellers and battle round-the-clock to maintain access to vital road links. With sudden changes in the weather, from torrential rain to snow blizzards and sudden temperature changes, the teams have their work cut out for them. Risking life and limb in some of Europes harshest conditions, it takes a special breed of men and women to overcome the many challenges thay face on a daily basis. As the roads turn into icy bobsleigh tracks, haulage container vehicles and private cars and vans all get themselves into difficulties and need to be rescued by our road warrior heroes.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Chemicals. Garbage. Fish. A trucker needing a rescue isnt concerned about just his rig. The trucks cargo is another big worry. Stig is sent to rescue an animal transport carrying live pigs that got stuck in a ditch, Thord heads out to rescue a truck carrying hot asphalt that tipped when it moved over for oncoming traffic, on another rescue Thord races against time to rescue a truck carrying thousands of euros worth of fish.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Ice Road rescuers are tough guys physically, but they also must buck up mentally when the clock is ticking, and split-second decisions could make all the difference. In this episode Ole Henrik and Stig deal with a fuel truck with frozen brakes, Thord has a one-hour deadline, Ole Henriks crew needs three tow trucks to rescue a stuck rig, and Thord tries to squeeze his truck through an impossibly tight space to carry out his rescue.

programme.title: Secrets of Neuschwanstein
programme.desc: 150 years after its construction, one of the most famous castles in the world is being completely restored. National Geographic has been given unprecedented access to the entire restoration process. The dream of King Ludwig the 2nd Neuschwanstein Castle is a place full of dreams and legends. We will attempt to decipher some of its greatest secrets.

programme.title: Celebrations from Above
programme.desc: Every year, ancient and modern festivities unfold across the European, Asian, and African continents. Witness these grand celebrations from a truly unique aerial perspective. Fly over the worlds largest religious gathering and dive into a festival of colors in India. Zoom through fireworks over Krakow, Poland and take in a spectacular Viking fire festival that lights up the winter skies of Scotlands Shetland Islands. See pride like never before, as the celebration takes to the streets of Johannesburg, South Africa.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This spectacular aerial journey across Europe reveals Christmas as its never been seen before. Flying cameras soar over a dazzling train of lights on Englands coastline and uncover an extraordinary logistical feat at Santas Post Office. We cross the continent to explore the unique sights that mark the festive season, from a show-stopping monsters parade, and an Alpine aerial fireworks extravaganza, to Finlands iconic reindeer herds.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Lawless Island

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Disaster is often the consequence when international truck drivers try to manoeuver on the Norwegian winter roads. Boss Thord heads out to help one of them. The driver didnt manage to put the wheel chains on correctly, and got caught in a dangerous road bend. Bjorn, the lone wolf, is heading out to a similar situation. Bjorn gets angry when he realises the driver tried to drive up a hill without chains. It was reckless.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thords under stress when a rescue fails at his third attempt and time is running out. Bjoern tries to get a 46-ton truck and trailer out of a deep ditch, but the only thing thats moving is his own tow truck. In the far North, Jo Rogers on a mission to get a truck and trailer that tipped over back onto its wheels. The trucks on a tight deadline delivering fresh salmon for export so he has to hurry to save the day.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Highway Havoc!

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Thirty-two years ago, a young female is found dead in the desert outside Phoenix - her body too badly decomposed to identify. Now, crime scene technician Stephanie Bourgois is joining forces with the DNA Doe Project to find the girls name and bring her home.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: In 1961, a body was found crushed under ice in a railroad car in Nebraska and quickly buried. After discovering his grave marked with the words "Unknown Negro," local journalist Marresa Burke is determined to find his family. Teaming up the DNA Doe Project, they take a sample from his exhumed body before following a trail of clues across the country.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did a train crash at Lac Megantic send 200 ft fireballs into the night sky and destroy half a town? Why did a sugar factory explode in Georgia killing 14? How did the Ever Given become do firmly wedged across the Suez canal that it cost $60bn?

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 38 years, the remains of a young woman - found murdered by the side of a freeway outside of Tyler, Texas - have sat inside a cardboard box in the Smith County Sheriffs Office. Now, with retirement looming, Detective David Turner is teaming up with the DNA Doe Project to solve the case, find her family and - finally - lay her to rest.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: In this opening episode, we recount the life of Chinggis Khan, beginning with the dramatic struggles of his early years, including his familys fall from power, his survival against rival tribes, and his first alliances as a young warrior determined to rescue his kidnapped wife, Borte.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: The Inca Empire rose in the 15th century, yet its origins remained shrouded in mystery for centuries. Follow Manco Capac, the first Inca and Pachacutec, the mythical emperor who reshaped a civilization. Pachacutec built Machu Picchu, revolutionized architecture, and drew on the legacy of an older society to rewrite his peoples history. Claiming the title "Son of the Sun," he expanded the empire beyond the Cuzco Valley, imposed a solar cult as the state religion, and even instituted human sacrifices to assert his power. With cutting-edge science and ultra-realistic 3D reconstructions from Machu Picchu to Chilean volcanoes, Lake Titicaca, and Cuzco, witness the breathtaking birth of the Empire of the Sun.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: New discoveries and cutting-edge research reveal the origins of the greatest monument built by the Roman Empire - the Colosseum. Investigations across Italy explore the roots of this symbol of Roman power and the gladiator games that were held there. New archaeological findings at the Colosseum uncover evidence revealing the true extent of the structure and how it may have looked at its opening games.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. A woman carrying cocaine in her body may have an accomplice. Its up to police to track her down before she can leave the country. Officers get word of a cocaine shipment and set up sting. An elderly woman seems surprised when police find cocaine in her bag. Could she be in on the scheme? A childrens suit is soaked in cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: On this episode, agents of the Antinarcotics Division of Jorge Chavez International Airport, in Lima, Peru, deal with a case of unique characteristics. In the meantime, officials face language barriers as they detain an Indonesian woman. And a passenger is carrying what seem to be adorable baby blankets, but they are really full of narcotics. At the loading docks, a shipment containing 24 jars puts the drug-detecting dogs keen sense of smell to the test. Plus, the international flight rush hour results in 2 young passengers being detained side by side at the antinarcotics division headquarters.

programme.title: The Next Mega Tsunami
programme.desc: Ten years after one of the most deadly tsunamis ever known, scientists are making a shocking discovery. Experts used to believe that the biggest killer waves were only generated in a handful of regions.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The Royal Navys battle with Bismarck is a pivotal point in the Second World War. If Bismarck had succeeded in attacking the British convoy system, then Britain would probably have been forced to surrender, leaving no bridgehead for an Anglo-American liberation of Europe. In losing Bismarck, the Germans lost their opportunity to defeat Britain and turn the tide of war. Naval historian Andrew Lambert has studied this famous sea battle and sheds light on the reasons for Bismarcks fate. He believes the sinking follows a catalogue of errors on both sides, and ultimately he finds fault with the core German war strategy.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: Noah and the Great Flood is one of the Bibles best-known tales. Now, investigators seek to unravel the storys origins, which may predate the Old Testament. They explore some of the earliest cities in Mesopotamia, use the latest science to examine past climates, decipher clay tablets, and put an ancient blueprint of the Ark to the test. Immersive CGI brings this long-lost story to life.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: The story of Exodus is one of the great biblical tales, but why does ancient Egypt play such a central role? We follow a new season of excavations to find answers. Teams brush away layers of earth to reveal a magnificent lost palace and decipher reliefs from the temple of one of Egypts greatest pharaohs. New discoveries shed light on the period in which this biblical story was set.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: According to the Gospels, the Crown of Thorns was worn by Jesus Christ during his crucifixion, and is today one of the Catholic religions most sacred relics. Fr. Patrick Hough, a Jesuit priest, investigates a relic said to be the real Crown, protected in Paris at the Cathedral of Notre Dame. He explores a thorn from the Crown that appears to miraculously bleed. And the construction of a crown using thorns found around Jerusalem may shed new light on Christs crucifixion. Also in this episode, a series of mummies, over 600 years old, have been found in remote part of the mountainous regions of Peru.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: This episode of Ancient X Files investigates what advances in science since the last time the shroud was tested, in 1988, might reveal about this mysterious religious relic. Developments in photo-imaging may have revealed letters hidden around the head. But who wrote them and why? One scientist believes he may have discovered that the image itself was created by a huge burst of electrical energy. Also in this episode, the discovery of a strange, buried structure dating back 4000 years could be the oldest temple in the Americas.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Easter Islands tall stone moai have long captured the global imagination, and there are still mysteries surrounding them. Out of nearly 1,000, why is one particular moai, called Tukuturi, the only one kneeling and sporting a beard? In 1950s USA, sightings of UFOs were a national phenomenon. Alien or not, many Americans didnt realize that the US military was working their own flying saucer: the Avrocar. And just after Newtons discoveries about gravity, 18th-century German physician Franz Anton Mesmer also proposed an invisible force that he called ""animal magnetism." To harness it, he built a device from a giant wooden tub saying it could cure any illness. Patients seemed to corroborate the claim, but could it be true?

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport, anti-narcotics police work hard to prevent drugs from moving out of the country. Agents race to locate a suspect, discovered in an unlikely location. An arrogant smuggler with an impregnated suitcase has double the expected load. A young man has ingested and taped drugs to his body. A case of addiction - but just to coffee. Cocaine hidden under a winter jacket. Mechanical parts conceal cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: Security officials at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport work non-stop to uncover smugglers. A man conceals cocaine in the structure of his suitcase. He breaks down when he tells his mother hes been arrested. A passenger to Spain carries drugs in unmarked food packages. A couple want to travel to Mexico with an unusual pet. A woman bound for Mexico fears she carries contraband disguised as a gift. Cocaine-contaminated olives.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Inside The Mega Twister
programme.desc: The tornado that struck El Reno, Oklahoma, on May 31st, 2013, defied superlatives. It was the largest, one of the fastest, and for storm chasers the most lethal twister ever recorded on Earth. In a unique documentary, professionals and witnesses unravel the tornado and tell its story. This is no typical storm-chasing documentary. Among those whose lives it claimed was Tim Samaras, revered as one of the most experienced and cautious scientists studying tornadoes. This storm, however was unlike any he had witnessed before. The storm was also probably the best documented in history. In the wake of the tragedy, Dr Anton Seimon gathered all the video footage available of the storm and organised it into a searchable database. He pinpointed the exact location of every camera pointing at the storm, and used lightning patterns to synchronise every frame of video down to the second. Combined with many first-hand accounts and harrowing videos from scientists and amateur storm chasers, and accompanied by some state-of-the-art CGI animations, the result is an extraordinary and unprecedented journey through the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Superstorm New York: What Really Happened
programme.desc: Experts investigate the cause behind the storm that ravaged New York, as well as scrutinise the US governments response plans.

programme.title: Top Ten Natural Disasters
programme.desc: In this 2 hour, National Geographic special, 10 world experts formulate a list of the most important natural disasters of all time. Using eye witness video, historical archive and cutting edge CGI, they not only reveal the key moments that turned a natural phenomenon into a human catastrophe, but explain why the disaster theyve selected is a genuine game-changer, worthy of its place as a one of the Top Ten Natural Disasters.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The Royal Navys battle with Bismarck is a pivotal point in the Second World War. If Bismarck had succeeded in attacking the British convoy system, then Britain would probably have been forced to surrender, leaving no bridgehead for an Anglo-American liberation of Europe. In losing Bismarck, the Germans lost their opportunity to defeat Britain and turn the tide of war. Naval historian Andrew Lambert has studied this famous sea battle and sheds light on the reasons for Bismarcks fate. He believes the sinking follows a catalogue of errors on both sides, and ultimately he finds fault with the core German war strategy.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Africas River Titans
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Africa is a land of giants. Its powerful rivers sculpt the earth and form impressive valleys and waterways home to many imposing and powerful inhabitants.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the Savannah turns into a battleground, its hard to choose a hero. Who will win when its tooth versus claw?

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Life in the African bush is a game of survival, for both hunter and hunted. Add babies to the mix and youll see astounding feats of courage as mothers risk life and limb to protect their young. In spring, tall grass helps babies hide out of sight, but it also camouflages predators on the prowl. This game drive captures extraordinary behaviour as families and individuals battle to eat, defend, and raise young.

programme.title: Africas Wild Geniuses
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Africa, with its diverse ecosystems from arid deserts to lush forests, is home to some remarkable wild geniuses. While these outliers may not be the strongest, they compensate with their wit.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the Savannah turns into a battleground, its hard to choose a hero. Who will win when its tooth versus claw?

programme.title: Africas Wild Geniuses
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Africa, with its diverse ecosystems from arid deserts to lush forests, is home to some remarkable wild geniuses. While these outliers may not be the strongest, they compensate with their wit.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australias rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Day of the Dragon
programme.desc: The clock starts just before sunrise - when the temperature begins to rise. Its hard work being the worlds biggest lizard on Rinca island. Competition is so fierce he cant afford to slow down. For the biggest male on the island, an ever- warming environment and shrinking hunting grounds threaten his survival across every hour of the day.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Crocodile - Australias Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: In Australia, dominant saltwater crocodiles, called ""boss crocs," are the largest and most powerful animals on the continent. Even after unrelenting human pressure on their very survival, they are still the masters of their world. Over the last 200 years, the impact of human activities—such as commercial hunting, agriculture and population growth—pushed them to the brink of extinction. Today, these "boss crocs" have continued to not only survive but thrive.

programme.title: Day of the Dragon
programme.desc: The clock starts just before sunrise - when the temperature begins to rise. Its hard work being the worlds biggest lizard on Rinca island. Competition is so fierce he cant afford to slow down. For the biggest male on the island, an ever- warming environment and shrinking hunting grounds threaten his survival across every hour of the day.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: In an action packed episode of Animal Fight Club we reveal what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most vicious species fight tooth and claw in the deadliest of conflicts. With exclusive user generated content and footage from top wildlife filmmakers, this episode sheds new light on the fiercest fights Mother Nature has to offer, proving that its not always the animal you expect that ends up coming out on top …

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Natures vicious battles for survival come at every scale, from 6 ton Elephants, fighting in a testosterone fuelled blind fury, to slime covered inch and half long amphibian kick boxers, dangling in the jaws of death. This is a no-holds barred look at cold-hearted killers in the wild, revealing ambush experts with piercing canines, slithering assassins with crushing coils, and multi-layered fangs dealing death, in Animal Fight Club.

programme.title: Crocodile - Australias Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: In Australia, dominant saltwater crocodiles, called ""boss crocs," are the largest and most powerful animals on the continent. Even after unrelenting human pressure on their very survival, they are still the masters of their world. Over the last 200 years, the impact of human activities—such as commercial hunting, agriculture and population growth—pushed them to the brink of extinction. Today, these "boss crocs" have continued to not only survive but thrive.

programme.title: Croc Wars: Grumeti Vs Mara
programme.desc: Each year, nearly two million wildebeest and zebra cross the Serengeti on a quest for fresh grazing. But two legendary rivers stand in their way—the Grumeti and the Mara—each ruled by a formidable dynasty of Nile crocodiles. In "Croc Wars," follow these ancient predators as they prepare for the feast of the year, but not all crocodiles are created equal. In the deep, fast waters of the Mara, privilege reigns, kills come easy, and food is plentiful. In the rugged Grumeti, crocodiles must outwit, adapt and fight for every scrap. From brutal ambushes to stolen kills, this is a high-stakes battle for survival on two rivers with two strategies and only one chance to eat.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Scientists and hunters team up to fight one of the biggest ecological threats to the Florida Everglades: the Burmese python. In the 1990s, pet pythons were released into the wild and have eaten their way through the food chain. Today, nobody knows how many there are, but estimates may be in the hundreds of thousands. We follow the scientists as they track, gather data, and try to understand better how Pythons reproduce and adapt in the Everglades. Ian Bartoszerk and his team at the Conservancy of Southwest Florida use male scout snakes to lead them to females with the potential to lay up to eighty eggs at a time. At the U.S.G.S., Amy Yackle and Mark Sandfoss work in tandem with wildlife biologists from the National Park Service and the University of Florida to battle female reproduction on another front — Alligator Alley.

programme.title: Day of the Dragon
programme.desc: The clock starts just before sunrise - when the temperature begins to rise. Its hard work being the worlds biggest lizard on Rinca island. Competition is so fierce he cant afford to slow down. For the biggest male on the island, an ever- warming environment and shrinking hunting grounds threaten his survival across every hour of the day.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory embeds with an Antarctic colony and encounters social skills never filmed before. As the planet rapidly warms, he discovers bonds forged from birth between family, friends and strangers are the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, a group of penguins left the ice in search of more. Riding powerful currents, the tiny adventurers arrived in strange new lands, reshaping traditions for deserts, tropics … and even among humans. They were tested to the extreme, becoming perhaps the smartest of them all. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory discovers penguin problem solving, talking, and their enduring search for new worlds.

programme.title: Day of the Dragon

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: "Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles" reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough. In this episode we see a female leopard fight a bigger male for her lunch and her life, discover the complex competition amongst the worlds largest Great Apes and see how a Nile Monitor Lizard can turn its tail into a show stopping weapon.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. programme.title: Man Among Cheetahs
programme.desc: Wildlife cinematographer Bob Poole journeys to a rugged and picturesque corner of Kenya to capture rare moments of the worlds fastest predators. He follows a fearless mother cheetah as she tries to raise her cubs and teach them the skills they need to survive. A

programme.title: Wild Lapland
programme.desc: A lyrical portrayal of the enchanting, wild creatures who call Lapland home.

programme.title: Polar Worlds with Bertie Gregory Mashup
programme.desc: National Geographic filmmaker Bertie Gregory travels to the gateways to the poles to film wildlife in two of the harshest environments on the planet: South Georgia Island above Antarctica, and Canadas frigid North below the Arctic Circle. Surviving in these vastly different environments require cunning, persistence and the ability to adapt to a changing climate. This is the story of Berties quest to capture these wild environments firsthand.

programme.title: Man Among Cheetahs
programme.desc: Wildlife cinematographer Bob Poole journeys to a rugged and picturesque corner of Kenya to capture rare moments of the worlds fastest predators. He follows a fearless mother cheetah as she tries to raise her cubs and teach them the skills they need to survive. A

programme.title: Wild Lapland

programme.title: Snow School
programme.desc: When every day is a snow day, school is always in session! Snowy climates can make for harsh living, and adulting is hard no matter where you are, but these young are flourishing; a baby walrus gets a swim lesson from Mom, young stoats playtime teaches them how to hunt, otter pups take a slide and learn to avoid predators, and owlets practice leaving the nest. Well also see penguin chicks daring to take the leap, an unlikely team of mismatched teenagers, and others learning how to weather and thrive in the coldest climates, thanks to their snowy homeschooling, some very dedicated parents, and a lot of trial and error.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Man Among Cheetahs
programme.desc: Wildlife cinematographer Bob Poole journeys to a rugged and picturesque corner of Kenya to capture rare moments of the worlds fastest predators. He follows a fearless mother cheetah as she tries to raise her cubs and teach them the skills they need to survive. A

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. Its feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Berties career.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Cheetahs Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie arrives in the Serengeti as the spectacular wildebeest migration kicks off. Hes here to film the fastest land animal on Earth: the cheetah. He gets close to a mother caring for her tiny cubs and a young group of males executing phenomenal hunts as a team, and learns about the unexpected challenges the species face.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri, a first-time Mom, is forced to add strategy to speed in order to avoid predators, feed her cubs and steer them successfully to adulthood

programme.title: The Way Of the Cheetah
programme.desc: Set in Kenya, the story tells of how Immani protects her 4 cubs against other male cheetah and other predators. By Dereck and Beverly Joubert.

programme.title: Cheetahs Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie arrives in the Serengeti as the spectacular wildebeest migration kicks off. Hes here to film the fastest land animal on Earth: the cheetah. He gets close to a mother caring for her tiny cubs and a young group of males executing phenomenal hunts as a team, and learns about the unexpected challenges the species face.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Wild Lapland
programme.desc: A lyrical portrayal of the enchanting, wild creatures who call Lapland home.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija nevar izlemt, ko dāvināt omītei. Tims uzņem pats savu Kapteiņa Dinozvaigznes filmu. Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: Rabla brālēns Čārdžers apciemo Piedzīvojumu līci tieši laikā, lai izpalīdzētu, kad Hamdingera izraisīts geizers izraisa haosu, kura rezultātā tiek sagrauta mistera Portera kafejnīca. Ar Rabla mašīnu, divi celtnieku ķepaiņi visu glābj, atjaunojot kafejnīcu. // Kad Piedzīvojumu līcī notiek "Spīdīgākā vāģa konkurss", mērs Hamdingers izdomā plānu, kā sabotēt Vinniju Viningtoni un citus dalībniekus, tāpēc Ķepu patruļai viss jāglābj.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāku papagailis Pollija ierodas ciemos. Pepai un Džordžam patīk Pollija. Viņa ir jautra un atkārto visu, ko citi saka. Kad Pollija aizlido, neviens nezina, kā viņu atrast, līdz Džordžs izdomā gudru plānu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene skatās "Detektīvu Kartupeli". Arī Pepa un Džordžs grib būt detektīvi. Tētis uzdod viņiem atrisināt mistēriju. Tedijs ir paslēpts, un Pepai kopā ar Džordžu jāizmanto palielināmais stikls, lai sekotu drupaču takai un atrisinātu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir laiks doties pie miera, Pepai un Džordžam ir jāiet vannā. Pēc tam viņi izmazgā zobus un lien gultā. Drīz vien viņi aizmieg. Mamma un tētis beidzot apsēžas, bet ir bijusi gara diena un arī viņi ir miegaini.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.
